Package org.jgrapes.mail.events

Class FoldersUpdated

java.lang.Object
org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
org.jgrapes.core.Event<Void>
org.jgrapes.mail.events.FoldersUpdated
All Implemented Interfaces:
Future<Void>, Associator, Eligible
public class FoldersUpdated extends Event<Void>
Signals the retrieval of mails (update) by a MailStoreMonitor.

Must be fired on a MailChannel.
